title: Buckwheat and butternut cupcakes with tahini maple icing
description: These vegan cupcakes are deliciously moist, thanks to their secret ingredient: butternut squash.Each cupcake provides 234 kcal, 2g protein, 21g carbohydrate (of which 7.5g sugars), 16g fat (of which 12g saturates), 1.5g fibre and 0.1g salt.
ingredients: dried edible rose petals or grated vegan chocolate, to decorate
